reg_info.full_title: R.R.O. 1990, Reg. 954: MINING IN PROVINCIAL PARKS
reg_info.act_under: Provincial Parks Act   Loi sur les parcs provinciaux

content.content:
1. No person shall engage in prospecting, the development of mineral interests or the working of mines in a provincial park except, (a) in a provincial park named in the following Table; and (b) under a licence of occupation or a lease issued under subsection 176 (3) of the Mining Act. TABLE  1.

Kesagami


2.

Lady Evelyn — Smoothwater


3.

Opasquia


4.

Wabakimi


5.

Woodland Caribou


6.

Butler Lake Provincial Nature Reserve


7.

Slate Islands Provincial Park


8.

Michipicoten Island Provincial Park


9.

Cranberry Lake Provincial Nature Reserve


10.

Lola Lake Provincial Nature Reserve


11.

Spruce Islands Provincial Nature Reserve


12.

Lake of the Woods Provincial Park


13.

Makobe-Grays River Provincial Park


14.

Abitibi-De Troyes Provincial Park


15.

Agassiz Peatlands Provincial Nature Reserve


16.

Craig’s Pit Provincial Nature Reserve


17.

Edward Island Provincial Nature Reserve


18.

Gravel River Provincial Nature Reserve


19.

Thompson Island Provincial Nature Reserve


20.

Wanapitei Provincial Park


21.

Divide Ridge Provincial Nature Reserve


22.

Red Sucker Point Provincial Nature Reserve


23.

Winnange Lake Provincial Park R.R.O. 1990, Reg. 954, s. 1.
content.raw_html:
1. No person shall engage in prospecting, the development of mineral interests or the working of mines in a provincial park except,

(a) in a provincial park named in the following Table; and

(b) under a licence of occupation or a lease issued under subsection 176 (3) of the Mining Act.

TABLE

1.

Kesagami

2.

3.
